page.title: 09FETES AND FAIRES
page.content: Every year Langford school has a fete to raise money for the school fund.This year it was held in the playground. Other people have fetes to raise money for chareties or to build a village hall. At the fetes there are many different stalls, such as cake stalls, lucky dips, bottle stalls, and white elephaunt stalls. Also there are many stalls with games where you can win prizes. Ice creams, sweets, and teas can be bought Sometimes there are Competitions and Fancy dress parades you can enter to win more prizes. There is always a raffle, for this you buy a ticket with a number on and if that number is drawn out at the end of the day you win something special. Sometimes there are rides on horses or donkeys. Fetes and faires are fun.
